name: english-practice-platform

scripts.postinstall: node -e "try{require('./node_modules/@rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu/package.json')}catch(e){try{require('child_process').execSync('npm install --no-optional @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu', {stdio:'inherit'})}catch(e2){console.log('Optional dependency installation failed, but this is OK for Vercel deployment')}}"

//: Workaround for Vercel deployment issue with rollup optional dependencies
